4303420.name: Temlegen: System Breakdown
4303420.description:
Temlegen takes place after a reboot of the universe. Because of these events, you find yourself trapped in a parallel reality, where every step brings you closer to a difficult and irreversible choice. You play as Tan Kyuu, awakening inside a futuristic underground complex filled with labyrinths, traps, and unfamiliar faces. Strangers surround you — people pulled into this place by forces beyond their understanding. There is a way forward, but no clear way back.

  • Explore

Discover the underground complex: corridors, rooms, and hidden paths reveal pieces of the story. You’ll uncover secrets and consequences — not all of them welcome.

  • Make choices

Every decision counts. Some choices move the story forward, others lead to different endings. Your actions shape the story, and seeing everything in a single playthrough is almost impossible.

  • Experience horror elements

Temlegen includes tense horror elements that can startle you. You’ll need quick reflexes and sharp reactions to face what happens. Temlegen is a big experiment that contains a story waiting to be discovered.
4303420.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
